message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm asking for $22,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to your business.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $22,000 is closer to my bottom line.  I'm willing to come down to $19,000. This is a significant discount and a great opportunity to acquire this valuable product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I am still unable to meet your previous asking price. I am willing to pay $16,000 for the product.
Bob, I'm trying to make this work, but $16,000 is still quite low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,500? That's my final offer.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I am willing to pay $17,000 for the product.
